Quick search

qa¶

This module contains functionality for basic pipeline-internal qa

Reference¶

apercal.subs.qa.checkdirtyimage(self, image)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if a dirty image is valid image (string): The path/name of the image to check returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise

apercal.subs.qa.checkimagegaussianity(self, image, alpha)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if an image has gaussian distribution image (string): The path/name of the image to check in FITS-format returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise

apercal.subs.qa.checkmaskimage(self, image)[source]¶

Checks if a mask is completely blanked. image: The input mask to check return: True if mask is not blank

apercal.subs.qa.checkmodelimage(self, image)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if a model image is valid image (string): The path/name of the image to check returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise

apercal.subs.qa.checkmodelpolimage(self, image)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if a model image is valid image (string): The path/name of the image to check returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise

apercal.subs.qa.checkrestoredimage(self, image)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if a restored image is valid image (string): The path/name of the image to check returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise

apercal.subs.qa.checkrestoredpolimage(self, image)[source]¶

Subroutine to check if a restored image is valid image (string): The path/name of the image to check returns (boolean): True if image is ok, False otherwise
